00226 void MainWindow::FinishManipulation( )
00227 {
00228         QModelIndex currentIndex = sceneModelView->currentIndex();
00229         SoBaseKit* coinNode = static_cast< SoBaseKit* >( m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex(currentIndex)->GetNode() );
00230 
00231         SoTransform* nodeTransform = static_cast< SoTransform* >( coinNode->getPart( "transform", true ) );
00232 
00233         QUndoCommand* command = new QUndoCommand();
00234 
00235         QString translationValue = QString( "%1 %2 %3" ).arg( QString::number( nodeTransform->translation.getValue()[0] ),
00236                                                                                                                 QString::number( nodeTransform->translation.getValue()[1] ),
00237                                                                                                                 QString::number( nodeTransform->translation.getValue()[2] ) );
00238         new CmdModifyParameter( nodeTransform, QString( "translation" ), translationValue, m_sceneModel, command );
00239         m_commandStack->push( command );
00240 
00241         m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
00242         m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
00243 
00244 }

00249 void MainWindow::StartManipulation( SoDragger* dragger )
00250 {
00251         SoSearchAction* coinSearch = new SoSearchAction();
00252         coinSearch->setNode( dragger );
00253         coinSearch->setInterest( SoSearchAction::FIRST);
00254 
00255         coinSearch->apply( m_graphicsRoot->GetNode() );
00256 
00257         SoPath* coinScenePath = coinSearch->getPath( );
00258         if( !coinScenePath ) tgf::SevereError( "PathFromIndex Null coinScenePath." );
00259 
00260         SoNodeKitPath* nodePath = static_cast< SoNodeKitPath* > ( coinScenePath );
00261         if( !nodePath ) tgf::SevereError( "PathFromIndex Null nodePath." );
00262 
00263 
00264         nodePath->truncate(nodePath->getLength()-1 );
00265         SoBaseKit* coinNode =  static_cast< SoBaseKit* > ( nodePath->getTail() );
00266 
00267         QModelIndex nodeIndex = m_sceneModel->IndexFromPath( *nodePath );
00268         m_selectionModel->setCurrentIndex( nodeIndex , QItemSelectionModel::ClearAndSelect );
00269 
00270         SoNode* manipulator = coinNode->getPart( "transform", true );
00271         m_manipulators_Buffer = new QStringList();
00272 
00273         SoFieldList fieldList;
00274     int totalFields = manipulator->getFields( fieldList );
00275 
00276     SoField* pField = 0;
00277     SbName fieldName;
00278     SbString fieldValue = "null";
00279 
00280 
00281         for( int index = 0; index < totalFields; ++index )
00282         {
00283                 pField = fieldList.get( index );
00284                 if( pField )
00285                 {
00286 
00287                 pField->get( fieldValue );
00288                         m_manipulators_Buffer->push_back(QString( fieldValue.getString() ) );
00289                 }
00290         }
00291         delete coinSearch;
00292 }

00297 void MainWindow::CalculateSunPosition()
00298 {
00299 #ifndef NO_MARBLE
00300 
00301         SoSceneKit* coinScene = m_document->GetSceneKit();
00302         if( !coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", false ) ) return;
00303 
00304         SunPositionCalculatorDialog sunposDialog;
00305         connect( &sunposDialog, SIGNAL( changeSunLight( double, double ) ) , this, SLOT( ChangeSunPosition( double, double ) ) );
00306 
00307         sunposDialog.exec();
00308 #endif /* NO_MARBLE*/
00309 
00310 }

00315 void MainWindow::DefineSunLight()
00316 {
00317         TSceneKit* coinScene = m_document->GetSceneKit();
00318         if( !coinScene ) return;
00319 
00320         InstanceNode* sceneInstance = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( sceneModelView->rootIndex() );
00321         InstanceNode* concentratorRoot = sceneInstance->children[ sceneInstance->children.size() -1 ];
00322         m_selectionModel->setCurrentIndex( m_sceneModel->IndexFromNodeUrl( concentratorRoot->GetNodeURL() ), QItemSelectionModel::ClearAndSelect );
00323 
00324         TLightKit* currentLight = 0;
00325         if( coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", false ) )       currentLight = static_cast< TLightKit* >( coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", false ) );
00326 
00327         QVector< TShapeFactory* > shapeFactoryList = m_pluginManager->GetShapeFactories();
00328 
00329         QVector< TShapeFactory* > tFlatShapeFactoryList;
00330         for( int i = 0; i < shapeFactoryList.size(); ++i  )
00331                 if( shapeFactoryList[i]->IsFlat() )     tFlatShapeFactoryList<<shapeFactoryList[i];
00332 
00333         QVector< TSunShapeFactory* > tSunShapeFactoryList = m_pluginManager->GetSunShapeFactories();
00334 
00335         LightDialog dialog( currentLight, tSunShapeFactoryList );
00336         if( dialog.exec() )
00337         {
00338 
00339                 TLightKit* lightKit = dialog.GetTLightKit();
00340                 if( !lightKit ) return;
00341 
00342                 lightKit->setName( "Light" );
00343 
00344                 CmdLightKitModified* command = new CmdLightKitModified( lightKit, coinScene, *m_sceneModel );
00345                 m_commandStack->push( command );
00346 
00347                 //UpdateLightDimensions();
00348                 m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
00349 
00350                 parametersView->UpdateView();
00351                 m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
00352 
00353                 actionCalculateSunPosition->setEnabled( true );
00354 
00355         }
00356 }

00361 void MainWindow::DefineTransmissivity()
00362 {
00363         TransmissivityDialog dialog( m_pluginManager->GetTransmissivityFactories() );
00364 
00365         TSceneKit* coinScene = m_document->GetSceneKit();
00366         if( !coinScene ) return;
00367 
00368         TTransmissivity* currentTransmissivity = static_cast< TTransmissivity* > ( coinScene->getPart( "transmissivity", false ) );
00369         if( currentTransmissivity )     dialog.SetCurrentTransmissivity( currentTransmissivity );
00370         if( dialog.exec() )
00371         {
00372                 TTransmissivity* newTransmissivity = dialog.GetTransmissivity();
00373                 coinScene->setPart( "transmissivity", newTransmissivity );
00374                 return;
00375         }
00376 }

00400 void MainWindow::ExportPhotonMap()
00401 {
00402         if ( m_photonMap == NULL )
00403         {
00404                 QMessageBox::information( this, "Tonatiuh", "No Photon Map stored", 1 );
00405             return;
00406         }
00407 
00408         ExportDialog exportDialog( *m_sceneModel, m_lastExportSurfaceUrl, m_lastExportInGlobal, m_lastExportFileName, this );
00409         if( !exportDialog.exec() ) return;
00410 
00411         QString fileName = exportDialog.GetExportFileName();
00412         if( fileName.isEmpty() )
00413         {
00414                 QMessageBox::information( this, "Tonatiuh", "No file defined to save Photon Map", 1 );
00415                 return;
00416         }
00417         m_lastExportFileName = fileName;
00418         m_lastExportInGlobal = exportDialog.ExportPhotonsInGlobal();
00419 
00420         //Compute photon power
00421         SoSceneKit* coinScene = m_document->GetSceneKit();
00422         if( !coinScene ) return;
00423         if( !coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", false ) ) return;
00424         TLightKit*lightKit = static_cast< TLightKit* >( coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", false ) );
00425 
00426 
00427         if( !lightKit->getPart( "tsunshape", false ) ) return;
00428         TSunShape* sunShape = static_cast< TSunShape * >( lightKit->getPart( "tsunshape", false ) );
00429         double irradiance = sunShape->GetIrradiance();
00430 
00431         if( !lightKit->getPart( "icon", false ) ) return;
00432         TLightShape* raycastingShape = static_cast< TLightShape * >( lightKit->getPart( "icon", false ) );
00433         double inputAperture = raycastingShape->GetValidArea();
00434 
00435         double wPhoton = ( inputAperture * irradiance ) / m_tracedRays;
00436 
00437         int okExport;
00438         if( exportDialog.ExportAllPhotonMap() )
00439                 okExport = trf::ExportAll( m_lastExportFileName, wPhoton, m_photonMap );
00440         else
00441         {
00442                 QString nodeURL = exportDialog.GetSelectedSurface();
00443                 if( !nodeURL.isEmpty() )        m_lastExportSurfaceUrl = nodeURL;
00444 
00445                 QModelIndex selectedNodeIndex = m_sceneModel->IndexFromNodeUrl( nodeURL );
00446                 InstanceNode* selectedSurface = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( selectedNodeIndex );
00447                 if( !selectedSurface )
00448                 {
00449                         QMessageBox::warning( this, "Tonatiuh", "Selected node in not a valid export node." );
00450                         return;
00451                 }
00452 
00453                 if( m_lastExportInGlobal )
00454                         okExport = trf::ExportSurfaceGlobalCoordinates( m_lastExportFileName, selectedSurface, wPhoton, m_photonMap );
00455                 else
00456                         okExport = trf::ExportSurfaceLocalCoordinates( m_lastExportFileName, selectedSurface, wPhoton, m_photonMap );
00457         }
00458         if( !okExport )
00459         {
00460                 QMessageBox::warning( this, "Tonatiuh", "An unexpected error has occurred exporting photon map to a file." );
00461                 return;
00462         }
00463 
00464 }

00469 void MainWindow::Open()
00470 {
00471     if ( OkToContinue() )
00472     {
00473         QSettings settings( "NREL UTB CENER", "Tonatiuh" );
00474         QString openDirectory = settings.value( "openDirectory", QString( "." ) ).toString();
00475 
00476         QString fileName = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName( this,
00477                                tr( "Open" ), openDirectory,
00478                                tr( "Tonatiuh files (*.tnh)" ) );
00479 
00480         if( fileName.isEmpty() ) return;
00481 
00482         QFileInfo file( fileName );
00483         settings.setValue( "openDirectory", file.absolutePath() );
00484         StartOver( fileName );
00485     }
00486 }

00491 void MainWindow::OpenRecentFile()
00492 {

00495         QAction* action = qobject_cast<QAction *>( sender() );
00496

00498         {
00499                 QString fileName = action->data().toString();
00500                 StartOver( fileName );
00501         }
00502     }
00503 }

00550 void MainWindow::ShowMenu( const QModelIndex& index)
00551 {
00552         if( !index.isValid() ) return;
00553         m_selectionModel->setCurrentIndex( index, QItemSelectionModel::ClearAndSelect );
00554 
00555         InstanceNode* instanceNode = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex(index);
00556         SoNode* coinNode = instanceNode->GetNode();
00557         SoType type = coinNode->getTypeId();
00558 
00559         QMenu popupmenu(this);
00560 
00561         if(instanceNode->GetParent()&&instanceNode->GetParent()->GetNode()->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoBaseKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00562         {
00563                 popupmenu.addAction( actionCut );
00564                 popupmenu.addAction( actionCopy );
00565                 popupmenu.addAction( actionPasteCopy );
00566                 popupmenu.addAction( actionPasteLink );
00567                 popupmenu.addAction( actionDelete );
00568         }
00569 
00570         if( type.isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) && !(type.isDerivedFrom( TAnalyzerKit::getClassTypeId() )))
00571         {
00572                 QMenu * trackersMenu = popupmenu.addMenu("Trackers" );
00573                 trackersMenu->addAction( actionSetAimingPointRelative);
00574                 trackersMenu->addAction( actionSetAimingPointAbsolute);
00575 
00576                 QMenu * transformMenu = popupmenu.addMenu("Convert to" );
00577                 //QMenu transformMenu( "Convert to", &popupmenu );
00578                 //popupmenu.addAction( transformMenu.menuAction() );
00579                 TSeparatorKit* coinKit = dynamic_cast< TSeparatorKit* > ( coinNode );
00580                 SoTransform* transform = static_cast< SoTransform* >( coinKit->getPart("transform", true) );
00581                 SoType transformType = transform->getTypeId();
00582 
00583 
00584                 if (!transformType.isDerivedFrom(SoCenterballManip::getClassTypeId()) ) transformMenu->addAction( tr("SoCenterballManip"),  this, SLOT(SoTransform_to_SoCenterballManip()));
00585                 if (!transformType.isDerivedFrom(SoHandleBoxManip::getClassTypeId()) )  transformMenu->addAction( tr("SoHandleBoxManip"), this, SLOT(SoTransform_to_SoHandleBoxManip()));
00586                 if (!transformType.isDerivedFrom(SoJackManip::getClassTypeId()) )       transformMenu->addAction( tr("SoJackManip"), this, SLOT(SoTransform_to_SoJackManip()));
00587                 if (!transformType.isDerivedFrom(SoTabBoxManip::getClassTypeId()) )     transformMenu->addAction( tr("SoTabBoxManip"), this, SLOT(SoTransform_to_SoTabBoxManip()));
00588                 if (!transformType.isDerivedFrom(SoTrackballManip::getClassTypeId()) ) transformMenu->addAction( tr("SoTrackballManip"),  this, SLOT(SoTransform_to_SoTrackballManip()));
00589                 if (!transformType.isDerivedFrom(SoTransformBoxManip::getClassTypeId()) ) transformMenu->addAction( tr("SoTransformBoxManip"), this, SLOT(SoTransform_to_SoTransformBoxManip()));
00590                 if (!transformType.isDerivedFrom(SoTransformerManip::getClassTypeId()) ) transformMenu->addAction( tr("SoTransformerManip"), this, SLOT(SoTransform_to_SoTransformerManip()));
00591 
00592 
00593 
00594                 if ( transformType.isDerivedFrom(SoTransformManip::getClassTypeId()) )  transformMenu->addAction( tr("SoTransform"), this, SLOT(SoManip_to_SoTransform()) );
00595 
00596         }
00597 
00598         //Mostramos el menu contextual
00599         popupmenu.exec( QCursor::pos() );
00600 
00601 }
00602 
00606 void MainWindow::ShowRayTracerOptionsDialog()
00607 {
00608         double oldSelectedRandomDeviate = m_selectedRandomDeviate;
00609         QVector< RandomDeviateFactory* > randomDeviateFactoryList = m_pluginManager->GetRandomDeviateFactories();
00610         QVector< TPhotonMapFactory* > photonmapFactoryList = m_pluginManager->GetPhotonMapFactories();
00611 
00612         RayTraceDialog* options = new RayTraceDialog( m_raysPerIteration, randomDeviateFactoryList, m_fraction,m_widthDivisions,m_heightDivisions, m_drawPhotons, photonmapFactoryList, m_selectedRandomDeviate, m_selectedPhotonMap, m_increasePhotonMap, this );
00613         options->exec();
00614 
00615         SetRaysPerIteration( options->GetNumRays() );
00616         m_selectedRandomDeviate = options->GetRandomDeviateFactoryIndex();
00617         if( oldSelectedRandomDeviate != m_selectedRandomDeviate )
00618         {
00619                 delete m_rand;
00620                 m_rand = 0;
00621         }
00622 
00623         m_fraction = options->GetRaysFactionToDraw();
00624         m_widthDivisions=options->GetWidthDivisions();
00625         m_heightDivisions=options->GetHeightDivisions();
00626         m_drawPhotons = options->DrawPhotons();
00627 
00628         m_selectedPhotonMap =options->GetPhotonMapFactoryIndex();
00629         m_increasePhotonMap = options->IncreasePhotonMap();
00630 
00631 }

00647 //View menu actions
00648 void MainWindow::on_actionAxis_toggled()
00649 {
00650         m_graphicView[0]->ViewCoordinateSystem( actionAxis->isChecked() );
00651         m_graphicView[1]->ViewCoordinateSystem( actionAxis->isChecked() );
00652         m_graphicView[2]->ViewCoordinateSystem( actionAxis->isChecked() );
00653         m_graphicView[3]->ViewCoordinateSystem( actionAxis->isChecked() );
00654 }

00656 void MainWindow::on_actionEdit_Mode_toggled()
00657 {
00658         if ( !actionEdit_Mode->isChecked() )
00659         {
00660                 m_graphicView[1]->hide();
00661                 m_graphicView[2]->hide();
00662                 m_graphicView[3]->hide();
00663                 m_focusView = 0;
00664         }
00665         else
00666         {
00667                 m_graphicView[1]->show();
00668                 m_graphicView[2]->show();
00669                 m_graphicView[3]->show();
00670         }
00671 }
00672 
00673 void MainWindow::on_actionSunPlane_triggered()
00674 {
00675 
00676         SoSceneKit* coinScene = m_document->GetSceneKit();
00677         if ( !coinScene )  return;
00678 
00679         //Check if there is a light and is properly configured
00680         if ( !coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", false ) )     return;
00681         TLightKit* lightKit = static_cast< TLightKit* >( coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", false ) );
00682         if ( !lightKit ) return;
00683 
00684 
00685         SoSearchAction* coinSearch = new SoSearchAction();
00686         coinSearch->setNode( lightKit );
00687         coinSearch->setInterest( SoSearchAction::FIRST );
00688         coinSearch->apply( m_graphicsRoot->GetNode() );
00689 
00690         SoPath* lightPath = coinSearch->getPath( );
00691         if( !lightPath ) tgf::SevereError( "MainWindow Null light path." );
00692 
00693         const SbViewportRegion vpr = m_graphicView[m_focusView]->GetViewportRegion();
00694         SoGetMatrixAction * getmatrixaction = new SoGetMatrixAction(vpr);
00695         getmatrixaction->apply( lightPath );
00696 
00697         Transform  lightToWorld = tgf::TransformFromMatrix( getmatrixaction->getMatrix() );
00698 
00699         //Vector3D camOrientation= lightToWorld( Vector3D( 0.0, -1.0, 0.0 ) );
00700 
00701         //double t = 1.0;
00702         //if( camPosition.y != 0.0 && camOrientation.y != 0.0 ) t = -camPosition.y / camOrientation.y;
00703         //Point3D targetPoint = camPosition + camOrientation * t;
00704 
00705 
00706         SoCamera* cam = m_graphicView[m_focusView]->GetCamera();
00707         Point3D camPosition = lightToWorld( Point3D( 0.0, cam->focalDistance.getValue(), 0.0 ) );
00708 
00709 
00710         SbVec3f target = getTargetOfCamera(cam);
00711 
00712         cam->position.setValue( target + SbVec3f( camPosition.x, camPosition.y, camPosition.z ) );
00713         cam->pointAt( target );
00714         //cam->viewAll( m_graphicsRoot->GetNode(), vpr );
00715 }
00716 
00717 SbVec3f MainWindow::getTargetOfCamera(SoCamera* cam)
00718 {
00719         SbVec3f axis;
00720         float angle;
00721         cam->orientation.getValue(axis,angle);
00722         SbRotation * rotation  = new SbRotation (axis,angle);
00723         SbVec3f center;
00724         rotation->multVec(SbVec3f (0, 0, -cam->focalDistance.getValue()), center);
00725         center += cam->position.getValue();
00726         return center;
00727 }
00728 
00729 void MainWindow::on_action_X_Y_Plane_triggered()
00730 {
00731         SoCamera* cam = m_graphicView[m_focusView]->GetCamera();
00732 
00733         SbVec3f target = getTargetOfCamera(cam);
00734 
00735         cam->position.setValue( target + SbVec3f( 0, 0, cam->focalDistance.getValue() ) );
00736         cam->pointAt( target, SbVec3f( 0, 1, 0 )  );
00737 
00738         //SbViewportRegion vpr = m_graphicView[m_focusView]->GetViewportRegion();
00739         //cam->viewAll( m_graphicsRoot->GetNode(), vpr );
00740 
00741 }

00799 void MainWindow::ChangeGridSettings()
00800 {
00801         GridSettingsDialog gridDialog( m_gridXElements, m_gridZElements, m_gridXSpacing, m_gridZSpacing );
00802         if( gridDialog.exec() )
00803         {
00804                 m_graphicsRoot->RemoveGrid();
00805 
00806                 m_gridXElements = gridDialog.GetXDimension();
00807                 m_gridZElements = gridDialog.GetZDimension();
00808 
00809                 if( gridDialog.IsSizeDefined() )
00810                 {
00811                         m_gridXSpacing = gridDialog.GetXSpacing();
00812                         m_gridZSpacing = gridDialog.GetZSpacing();
00813                 }
00814                 else
00815                 {
00816 
00817                         InstanceNode* sceneInstance = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( sceneModelView->rootIndex() );
00818                         if ( !sceneInstance )  return;
00819                         InstanceNode* rootInstance = sceneInstance->children[sceneInstance->children.size() -1 ];
00820                         if ( !rootInstance )  return;
00821 
00822                         SoGetBoundingBoxAction* bbAction = new SoGetBoundingBoxAction( SbViewportRegion() ) ;
00823                         rootInstance->GetNode()->getBoundingBox( bbAction );
00824 
00825                         SbBox3f box = bbAction->getXfBoundingBox().project();
00826                         delete bbAction;
00827 
00828 
00829                         m_gridXSpacing = 10;
00830                         m_gridZSpacing = 10;
00831 
00832                         if( !box.isEmpty() )
00833                         {
00834                                 SbVec3f min, max;
00835                                 box.getBounds(min, max);
00836 
00837                                 m_gridXSpacing = ( 2 *  std::max( fabs( max[0] ), fabs( min[0] ) ) + 5  ) / m_gridXElements;
00838                                 m_gridZSpacing = ( 2 *  std::max( fabs( max[2] ), fabs( min[2] ) ) + 5 ) / m_gridZElements;
00839 
00840                         }
00841 
00842                 }
00843                 m_graphicsRoot->AddGrid( CreateGrid( m_gridXElements, m_gridZElements, m_gridXSpacing, m_gridZSpacing ) );
00844                 m_graphicsRoot->ShowGrid( true );
00845         }
00846 
00847 }

00853 {
00854         if( !index.isValid() )  return;

00859 
00860         CmdChangeNodeName* command = new CmdChangeNodeName( index, newName, m_sceneModel );
00861         QString commandText = QString( "Node name changed to: %1").arg( newName );
00862         command->setText(commandText);
00863         m_commandStack->push( command );
00864 
00865         m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
00866 
00867 }

00910 void MainWindow::CreateGroupNode()
00911 {
00912         QModelIndex parentIndex;
00913         if (( !sceneModelView->currentIndex().isValid() ) || ( sceneModelView->currentIndex() == sceneModelView->rootIndex()))
00914                 parentIndex = m_sceneModel->index (0,0,sceneModelView->rootIndex());
00915         else
00916                 parentIndex = sceneModelView->currentIndex();
00917 
00918         InstanceNode* parentInstance = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( parentIndex );
00919         if( !parentInstance ) return;
00920 
00921         SoNode* coinNode = parentInstance->GetNode();
00922         if( !coinNode ) return;
00923 
00924         if ( coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TAnalyzerKit::getClassTypeId() ) ) return;
00925 
00926         if ( coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00927         {
00928                 TSeparatorKit* separatorKit = new TSeparatorKit();
00929 
00930                 CmdInsertSeparatorKit* cmdInsertSeparatorKit = new CmdInsertSeparatorKit( separatorKit, QPersistentModelIndex(parentIndex), m_sceneModel );
00931                 cmdInsertSeparatorKit->setText( "Insert SeparatorKit node" );
00932                 m_commandStack->push( cmdInsertSeparatorKit );
00933 
00934                 int count = 1;
00935                 QString nodeName = QString( "TSeparatorKit%1").arg( QString::number( count) );
00936                 while ( !m_sceneModel->SetNodeName( separatorKit, nodeName ) )
00937                 {
00938                         count++;
00939                         nodeName = QString( "TSeparatorKit%1").arg( QString::number( count) );
00940                 }
00941                 
00942                 m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
00943                 m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
00944 
00945         }
00946 }

00963         if( !selectedCoinNode ) return;
00964 
00965         if ( selectedCoinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00966         {

00968

00973                 CmdInsertAnalyzerKit* insertAnalyzerKit = new CmdInsertAnalyzerKit( parentIndex, analyzerKit, m_sceneModel );

00980                         count++;

00992 void MainWindow::CreateMaterial( QString materialType )
00993 {
00994         QVector< TMaterialFactory* > factoryList = m_pluginManager->GetMaterialFactories();
00995         if( factoryList.size() == 0 )   return;
00996 
00997         QVector< QString > materialNames;
00998         for( int i = 0; i < factoryList.size(); i++ )
00999                 materialNames<< factoryList[i]->TMaterialName();
01000 
01001         int selectedMaterial = materialNames.indexOf( materialType );
01002         if( selectedMaterial < 0 )      return;
01003 
01004         CreateMaterial( factoryList[ selectedMaterial ] );
01005 }

01125 void MainWindow::Delete( )
01126 {
01127         if( !m_selectionModel->hasSelection() ) return;
01128         QModelIndex selection = m_selectionModel->currentIndex();
01129         m_selectionModel->clearSelection();
01130 
01131         InstanceNode* selectionNode = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( selection );
01132         m_selectionModel->setCurrentIndex( m_sceneModel->IndexFromNodeUrl( selectionNode->GetParent()->GetNodeURL() ), QItemSelectionModel::ClearAndSelect );
01133 
01134 
01135 
01136         Delete( selection );
01137 }

01150 
01151 }

01192 void MainWindow::InsertFileComponent( QString componentFileName )
01193 {
01194         QModelIndex parentIndex;
01195         if (( !sceneModelView->currentIndex().isValid() ) || ( sceneModelView->currentIndex() == sceneModelView->rootIndex() ) )
01196                         parentIndex = m_sceneModel->index (0,0,sceneModelView->rootIndex());
01197         else
01198                 parentIndex = sceneModelView->currentIndex();
01199 
01200         SoNode* coinNode = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( parentIndex )->GetNode();
01201         if ( !coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) ) return;
01202 
01203         if ( componentFileName.isEmpty() ) return;
01204 
01205         SoInput componentInput;
01206         if ( !componentInput.openFile( componentFileName.toLatin1().constData() ) )
01207         {
01208                 QMessageBox::warning( 0, tr( "Scene Graph Structure" ),
01209                                 tr( "Cannot open file:\n%1." ).arg( componentFileName ) );
01210                 return;
01211         }
01212 
01213         SoSeparator* componentSeparator = SoDB::readAll( &componentInput );
01214         componentInput.closeFile();
01215 
01216         if ( !componentSeparator )
01217         {
01218                 QMessageBox::warning( 0, tr( "Scene Graph Structure" ),
01219                                 tr( "Error reading file: \n%1." )
01220                                 .arg( componentFileName ) );
01221                 return;
01222         }
01223 
01224         TSeparatorKit* componentRoot = static_cast< TSeparatorKit* >( componentSeparator->getChild(0) );
01225         CmdInsertSeparatorKit* cmdInsertSeparatorKit = new CmdInsertSeparatorKit( componentRoot, QPersistentModelIndex(parentIndex), m_sceneModel );
01226         cmdInsertSeparatorKit->setText( "Insert SeparatorKit node" );
01227         m_commandStack->push( cmdInsertSeparatorKit );
01228 
01229         m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
01230         m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
01231 
01232 }
01233 
01239 void MainWindow::InsertUserDefinedComponent()
01240 {
01241         QModelIndex parentIndex;
01242          if (( !sceneModelView->currentIndex().isValid() ) || ( sceneModelView->currentIndex() == sceneModelView->rootIndex() ) )
01243                  parentIndex = m_sceneModel->index (0,0,sceneModelView->rootIndex());
01244          else
01245                  parentIndex = sceneModelView->currentIndex();
01246 
01247         SoNode* coinNode = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( parentIndex )->GetNode();
01248 
01249         if ( !coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) ) return;
01250 
01251         QString fileName = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName( this,
01252                                                        tr( "Open Tonatiuh document" ), ".",
01253                                                        tr( "Tonatiuh component (*.tcmp)" ) );
01254 
01255         if ( fileName.isEmpty() ) return;
01256 
01257         InsertFileComponent( fileName );
01258 }

01282 void MainWindow::Paste( QString nodeURL, QString pasteType)

01315 
01319 void MainWindow::Run()
01320 {
01321         QDateTime startTime = QDateTime::currentDateTime();
01322 
01323     // Initialize variables
01324         InstanceNode* rootSeparatorInstance = 0;
01325         InstanceNode* lightInstance = 0;
01326         SoTransform* lightTransform = 0;
01327         TSunShape* sunShape = 0;
01328         TLightShape* raycastingSurface = 0;
01329         TTransmissivity* transmissivity = 0;
01330 
01331         if( ReadyForRaytracing( rootSeparatorInstance, lightInstance, lightTransform, sunShape, raycastingSurface, transmissivity ) )
01332         {
01333                 m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
01334                 m_sceneModel->PrepareAnalyze();
01335                 QVector< QPair< TShapeKit*, Transform > > surfacesList;
01336 
01337                 //Compute bounding boxes and world to object transforms
01338                 trf::ComputeSceneTreeMap( rootSeparatorInstance, Transform( new Matrix4x4 ), &surfacesList,true );
01339 
01340                 TLightKit* light = static_cast< TLightKit* > ( lightInstance->GetNode() );
01341                 light->ComputeLightSourceArea( m_widthDivisions,m_heightDivisions,surfacesList );
01342 
01343                 //Compute the valid areas for the raytracing
01344                 QVector< QPair< int, int > > validAreasList = raycastingSurface->GetValidAreasCoord();
01345 
01346                 QVector< QPair< double, QPoint > > raysPerPixel;
01347                 const int maximumValueProgressScale = validAreasList.count();
01348                 if(int(m_raysPerIteration)<validAreasList.count())m_raysPerIteration=validAreasList.count();
01349                 unsigned long  t1 = m_raysPerIteration / maximumValueProgressScale;
01350 
01351                 for( int progressCount = 0; progressCount < maximumValueProgressScale; ++ progressCount )
01352                 {
01353                         QPair< int, int > coord = validAreasList[ progressCount ];
01354                         QPoint pixelsCoord( coord.first, coord.second );
01355                         raysPerPixel<<QPair< double, QPoint >( t1, pixelsCoord );
01356                 }
01357 
01358                 Transform lightToWorld = tgf::TransformFromSoTransform( lightTransform );
01359 
01360                 // Create a progress dialog.
01361                 QProgressDialog dialog;
01362                 dialog.setLabelText( QString("Progressing using %1 thread(s)..." ).arg( QThread::idealThreadCount() ) );
01363 
01364                 // Create a QFutureWatcher and conncect signals and slots.
01365                 QFutureWatcher< TPhotonMap* > futureWatcher;
01366                 QObject::connect(&futureWatcher, SIGNAL(finished()), &dialog, SLOT(reset()));
01367                 QObject::connect(&dialog, SIGNAL(canceled()), &futureWatcher, SLOT(cancel()));
01368                 QObject::connect(&futureWatcher, SIGNAL(progressRangeChanged(int, int)), &dialog, SLOT(setRange(int, int)));
01369                 QObject::connect(&futureWatcher, SIGNAL(progressValueChanged(int)), &dialog, SLOT(setValue(int)));
01370 
01371                 QMutex mutex;
01372                 QFuture< TPhotonMap* > photonMap;
01373 
01374                 if( transmissivity )
01375                         photonMap = QtConcurrent::mappedReduced( raysPerPixel, RayTracer(  rootSeparatorInstance, lightInstance, raycastingSurface, sunShape, lightToWorld, transmissivity, *m_rand, &mutex, m_photonMap ), trf::CreatePhotonMap, QtConcurrent::UnorderedReduce );
01376 
01377                 else
01378                         photonMap = QtConcurrent::mappedReduced( raysPerPixel, RayTracerNoTr(  rootSeparatorInstance, lightInstance, raycastingSurface, sunShape, lightToWorld, *m_rand, &mutex, m_photonMap ), trf::CreatePhotonMap, QtConcurrent::UnorderedReduce );
01379 
01380                 futureWatcher.setFuture( photonMap );
01381 
01382                 // Display the dialog and start the event loop.
01383                 dialog.exec();
01384                 futureWatcher.waitForFinished();
01385                 m_tracedRays += t1 * validAreasList.count();
01386                 m_raysPerIteration=m_tracedRays;
01387 
01388 
01389 
01390                 QDateTime time2 = QDateTime::currentDateTime();
01391                 std::cout <<"time2: "<< startTime.secsTo( time2 ) << std::endl;
01392 
01393         /*
01394                 //Display a dialog
01395 
01396                 QString st;
01397                 QString area( QString("The valid sun area is %2" ).arg(st.setNum(raycastingSurface->GetValidArea())));
01398                 QString drawRays( QString("Number of rays traced: %1\n").arg(st.setNum(m_tracedRays)));
01399                 QString Finishmessage=QString(" The execution is succesfully finished in %1 seconds.\n %2.\n %3").arg(st.setNum(startTime.secsTo( time2 )),area,drawRays);
01400                 QMessageBox::information( this, QString( "Completed" ), Finishmessage);
01401         */
01402 
01403                 /*SoSFVec3f scaleVect = lightTransform->scaleFactor;
01404                 float scalex, scaley, scalez;
01405                 scaleVect.getValue().getValue( scalex, scaley, scalez );
01406                 //m_sceneModel->FinalyzeAnalyze( double( m_raysPerIteration )/( raycastingSurface->GetArea() * scalex * scalez ) );
01407                 m_sceneModel->FinalyzeAnalyze( double( m_raysPerIteration )/( raycastingSurface->GetValidArea() ) );
01408         */
01409 
01410                 ShowRaysIn3DView();
01411 
01412 
01413         }
01414 
01415         QDateTime endTime = QDateTime::currentDateTime();
01416         std::cout <<"Elapsed time: "<< startTime.secsTo( endTime ) << std::endl;
01417 }

01433 bool MainWindow::Save()
01434 {
01435         if ( m_currentFile.isEmpty() ) return SaveAs();
01436         else return SaveFile( m_currentFile );
01437 }
01438 
01444 bool MainWindow::SaveAs()
01445 {
01446 
01447         QSettings settings( "NREL UTB CENER", "Tonatiuh" );
01448 
01449         QString saveDirectory = settings.value( "saveDirectory", QString( "." ) ).toString();
01450 
01451         QString tonatiuhFilter( "Tonatiuh files (*.tnh)" );
01452         QString fileName = QFileDialog::getSaveFileName( this,
01453                                tr( "Save" ), saveDirectory,
01454                                tonatiuhFilter, &tonatiuhFilter );
01455         if( fileName.isEmpty() ) return false;
01456 
01457         QFileInfo file( fileName );
01458         settings.setValue( "saveDirectory", file.absolutePath() );
01459 
01460         if( file.completeSuffix().compare( "tnh" ) )
01461                 fileName.append( ".tnh" );
01462         return SaveFile( fileName );
01463 }

01469 void MainWindow::SelectNode( QString nodeUrl )
01470 {
01471         QModelIndex nodeIndex = m_sceneModel->IndexFromNodeUrl( nodeUrl );
01472         m_selectionModel->setCurrentIndex( nodeIndex , QItemSelectionModel::ClearAndSelect );
01473 }
01474 
01479 bool MainWindow::SaveComponent()
01480 {
01481     if( !m_selectionModel->hasSelection() ) return false;
01482     if( m_selectionModel->currentIndex() == sceneModelView->rootIndex() ) return false;
01483 
01484     QModelIndex componentIndex = sceneModelView->currentIndex();
01485 
01486     SoNode* coinNode = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( componentIndex )->GetNode();
01487 
01488     if ( !coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
01489     {
01490         QMessageBox::warning( 0, tr( "Tonatiuh" ),
01491                                   tr( "Selected node in not valid  for component node" ) );
01492         return false;
01493     }
01494 
01495     TSeparatorKit* componentRoot = dynamic_cast< TSeparatorKit* > ( coinNode );
01496     if( !componentRoot ) return false;
01497 
01498 
01499         QString fileName = QFileDialog::getSaveFileName( this,
01500                                tr( "Save Tonatiuh component" ), ".",
01501                                tr( "Tonatiuh component (*.tcmp)" ) );
01502         if( fileName.isEmpty() ) return false;
01503 
01504         QFileInfo componentFile( fileName );
01505         if( componentFile.completeSuffix().compare( "tcmp" ) )
01506                 fileName.append( ".tcmp" );
01507 
01508     SoWriteAction SceneOuput;
01509     if ( !SceneOuput.getOutput()->openFile( fileName.toLatin1().constData() ) )
01510         {
01511         QMessageBox::warning( 0, tr( "Tonatiuh" ),
01512                               tr( "Cannot open file %1. " )
01513                             .arg( fileName ));
01514                 return false;
01515         }
01516 
01517     QApplication::setOverrideCursor( Qt::WaitCursor );
01518         SceneOuput.getOutput()->setBinary( false );
01519         SceneOuput.apply( componentRoot );
01520         SceneOuput.getOutput()->closeFile();
01521         QApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
01522         return true;
01523 }
01524 
01528 void MainWindow::SetNodeName( QString nodeName )
01529 {
01530         if( !m_selectionModel->hasSelection() ) return;
01531         if( m_selectionModel->currentIndex() == sceneModelView->rootIndex() ) return;
01532 
01533         ChangeNodeName( m_selectionModel->currentIndex(), nodeName );
01534 }
01535 
01539 int MainWindow::SetPhotonMapType( QString typeName )
01540 {
01541         QVector< TPhotonMapFactory* > factoryList = m_pluginManager->GetPhotonMapFactories();
01542         if( factoryList.size() == 0 )   return 0;
01543 
01544         QVector< QString > photonMapNames;
01545         for( int i = 0; i < factoryList.size(); i++ )
01546                 photonMapNames<< factoryList[i]->TPhotonMapName();
01547 
01548         m_selectedPhotonMap = photonMapNames.indexOf( typeName );
01549         if( m_selectedPhotonMap < 0 )   return 0;
01550 
01551         return 1;
01552 }
01553 
01557 void MainWindow::SetRaysPerIteration( unsigned long rays )
01558 {
01559         m_raysPerIteration = rays;
01560 }
01561 
01565 void MainWindow::SetValue( QString nodeUrl, QString parameter, QString value )
01566 {
01567         if( nodeUrl.isEmpty() || parameter.isEmpty() || value.isEmpty() )
01568         {
01569                 QMessageBox::information( this, "Tonatiuh",
01570             "You must define a node url, a parameter name and a value.", 1 );
01571                 return;
01572         }
01573 
01574         QModelIndex nodeIndex = m_sceneModel->IndexFromNodeUrl( nodeUrl );
01575         if( !nodeIndex.isValid() )
01576         {
01577                 QMessageBox::information( this, "Tonatiuh",
01578             "Defined node url is not a valid url.", 1 );
01579                 return;
01580         }
01581 
01582         InstanceNode* nodeInstance = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( nodeIndex );
01583         if( !nodeInstance )     return;
01584 
01585         SoNode* node = nodeInstance->GetNode();
01586         if( !node )     return;
01587         if ( node->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
01588         {
01589                 TSeparatorKit* separatorNode = static_cast< TSeparatorKit* >( node );
01590                 SoTransform* nodeTransform = static_cast< SoTransform* >( separatorNode->getPart( "transform", true ) );
01591                 node = nodeTransform;
01592         }
01593 
01594 
01595         SoField* parameterField = node->getField( parameter.toStdString().c_str() );
01596         if( !parameterField )
01597         {
01598                 QMessageBox::information( this, "Tonatiuh",
01599             QString( "Defined node has not contains the parameter %1." ).arg( parameter), 1 );
01600                 return;
01601         }
01602         SetParameterValue( node, parameter, value );
01603 }
01604 
01605 
01606 //Manipulators actions
01607 void MainWindow::SoTransform_to_SoCenterballManip()
01608 {
01609         //Transform to a SoCenterballManip manipulator
01610         QModelIndex currentIndex = sceneModelView->currentIndex();
01611 
01612         InstanceNode* instanceNode = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex(currentIndex);
01613         SoBaseKit* coinNode = static_cast< SoBaseKit* >( instanceNode->GetNode() );
01614         SoTransform* transform = static_cast< SoTransform* >( coinNode->getPart( "transform", false ) );
01615 
01616         SoCenterballManip * manipulator = new SoCenterballManip;
01617         manipulator->rotation.setValue(transform->rotation.getValue());
01618         manipulator->translation.setValue(transform->translation.getValue());
01619         manipulator->scaleFactor.setValue(transform->scaleFactor.getValue());
01620         manipulator->scaleOrientation.setValue(transform->scaleOrientation.getValue());
01621         manipulator->center.setValue(transform->center.getValue());
01622 
01623         coinNode->setPart("transform", manipulator);
01624         ChangeSelection( currentIndex );
01625 
01626         SoDragger* dragger = manipulator->getDragger();
01627         dragger->addStartCallback (startManipulator, static_cast< void*>( this ) );
01628         dragger->addFinishCallback(finishManipulator, static_cast< void*>( this ) );
01629 
01630         m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
01631 }
01632

01792 void MainWindow::SoManip_to_SoTransform()
01793 {
01794         //Transform manipulator to a SoTransform
01795         QModelIndex currentIndex = sceneModelView->currentIndex();
01796 
01797         InstanceNode* instanceNode = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex(currentIndex);
01798         SoBaseKit* coinNode = static_cast< SoBaseKit* >( instanceNode->GetNode() );
01799         SoTransformManip* manipulator = static_cast< SoTransformManip* >( coinNode->getPart( "transform", false ) );
01800         if( !manipulator ) return;
01801 
01802         SoTransform* transform = new SoTransform;
01803         transform->rotation.setValue(manipulator->rotation.getValue());
01804         transform->translation.setValue(manipulator->translation.getValue());
01805         transform->scaleFactor.setValue(manipulator->scaleFactor.getValue());
01806         transform->scaleOrientation.setValue(manipulator->scaleOrientation.getValue());
01807         transform->center.setValue(manipulator->center.getValue());
01808 
01809         coinNode->setPart("transform", transform);
01810         ChangeSelection( currentIndex );
01811 
01812         m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
01813 }
01814 
01815 //for graphicview signals
01816 void MainWindow::selectionFinish( SoSelection* selection )
01817 {
01818     if(selection->getNumSelected() == 0 ) return;
01819 
01820     SoPath* selectionPath = selection->getPath( 0 );
01821     if ( !selectionPath ) return;
01822 
01823     if ( !selectionPath->containsNode ( m_document->GetSceneKit() ) ) return;
01824 
01825     SoNodeKitPath* nodeKitPath = static_cast< SoNodeKitPath* >( selectionPath );
01826     if(nodeKitPath->getTail()->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom(TLightKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
01827     {
01828         selection->deselectAll();
01829         QModelIndex currentIndex = m_selectionModel->currentIndex();
01830         m_selectionModel->setCurrentIndex( currentIndex , QItemSelectionModel::ClearAndSelect );
01831         return;
01832     }
01833 
01834     if(nodeKitPath->getTail()->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom(SoDragger::getClassTypeId() ) ) return;
01835 
01836     QModelIndex nodeIndex = m_sceneModel->IndexFromPath( *nodeKitPath );
01837 
01838 
01839         if ( !nodeIndex.isValid() ) return;
01840         m_selectionModel->setCurrentIndex( nodeIndex , QItemSelectionModel::ClearAndSelect );
01841         m_selectionModel->select( nodeIndex , QItemSelectionModel::ClearAndSelect );
01842 
01843 }
01844 
01845 void MainWindow::ChangeSelection( const QModelIndex& current )
01846 {
01847         InstanceNode* instanceSelected = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( current );
01848     SoNode* selectedCoinNode = instanceSelected->GetNode();
01849 
01850     if (selectedCoinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoBaseKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
01851         {
01852                 SoBaseKit* selectedCoinNodeKit = static_cast< SoBaseKit* >( selectedCoinNode );
01853                 parametersView->SelectionChangedToKit( selectedCoinNodeKit);
01854         }
01855         else
01856         {
01857                 parametersView->SelectionChangedToPart(selectedCoinNode);
01858         }
01859 }
01860 
01861 //for sunposdialog signals
01866 void MainWindow::ChangeSunPosition(  double azimuth, double zenith )
01867 {
01868         SoSceneKit* coinScene = m_document->GetSceneKit();
01869         TLightKit* lightKit = static_cast< TLightKit* >( coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", false ) );
01870         if ( !lightKit )
01871         {
01872                 QMessageBox::warning( this, "Toantiuh warning", tr( "Sun not defined in scene" ) );
01873         }
01874         else
01875         {
01876                 CmdLightPositionModified* command = new CmdLightPositionModified( lightKit, azimuth, zenith );
01877                 m_commandStack->push( command );
01878 
01879                 //UpdateLightDimensions();
01880                 m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
01881                 m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
01882         }
01883 }
01884 
01885 
01891 void MainWindow::CreateMaterial( TMaterialFactory* pTMaterialFactory )
01892 {
01893         QModelIndex parentIndex = ( (! sceneModelView->currentIndex().isValid() ) || (sceneModelView->currentIndex() == sceneModelView->rootIndex() ) ) ?
01894                                                                 m_sceneModel->index( 0, 0, sceneModelView->rootIndex( )):
01895                                                                 sceneModelView->currentIndex();
01896 
01897         InstanceNode* parentInstance = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( parentIndex );
01898         SoNode* parentNode = parentInstance->GetNode();
01899         if( !parentNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoShapeKit::getClassTypeId() ) ) return;
01900 
01901         TShapeKit* shapeKit = static_cast< TShapeKit* >( parentNode );
01902         TMaterial* material = static_cast< TMaterial* >( shapeKit->getPart( "material", false ) );
01903 
01904     if ( material )
01905     {
01906         QMessageBox::information( this, "Tonatiuh Action",
01907                                   "This TShapeKit already contains a material node", 1);
01908             return;
01909     }
01910 
01911         material = pTMaterialFactory->CreateTMaterial();
01912     QString typeName = pTMaterialFactory->TMaterialName();
01913     material->setName( typeName.toStdString().c_str() );
01914 
01915     CmdInsertMaterial* createMaterial = new CmdInsertMaterial( shapeKit, material, m_sceneModel );
01916     QString commandText = QString( "Create Material: %1").arg( pTMaterialFactory->TMaterialName().toLatin1().constData() );
01917     createMaterial->setText(commandText);
01918     m_commandStack->push( createMaterial );
01919 
01920         m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
01921     m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
01922 }
01923 
01933 void MainWindow::CreateShape( TShapeFactory* pTShapeFactory )
01934 {
01935     QModelIndex parentIndex = ((! sceneModelView->currentIndex().isValid() ) || (sceneModelView->currentIndex() == sceneModelView->rootIndex())) ?
01936                                                                 m_sceneModel->index (0,0,sceneModelView->rootIndex()) : sceneModelView->currentIndex();
01937 
01938         InstanceNode* parentInstance = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( parentIndex );
01939         SoNode* parentNode = parentInstance->GetNode();
01940         if( !parentNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoShapeKit::getClassTypeId() ) ) return;
01941 
01942         TShapeKit* shapeKit = static_cast< TShapeKit* >( parentNode );
01943         TShape* shape = static_cast< TShape* >( shapeKit->getPart( "shape", false ) );
01944 
01945     if (shape)
01946     {
01947         QMessageBox::information( this, "Tonatiuh Action",
01948                                   "This TShapeKit already contains a shape", 1);
01949     }
01950     else
01951     {
01952         shape = pTShapeFactory->CreateTShape();
01953         /*Hay que comprobar si shape es nulo para no crear una superficie a partir de nulo que probacara el cierre de la aplicacion.*/
01954         if(shape!=0){
01955         shape->setName( pTShapeFactory->TShapeName().toStdString().c_str() );
01956         CmdInsertShape* createShape = new CmdInsertShape( shapeKit, shape, m_sceneModel );
01957         QString commandText = QString( "Create Shape: %1" ).arg( pTShapeFactory->TShapeName().toLatin1().constData());
01958         createShape->setText( commandText );
01959         m_commandStack->push( createShape );
01960 
01961         m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
01962         m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
01963         }
01964     }
01965 }
01966 
01967 
01968 void MainWindow::CreateTracker( TTrackerFactory* pTTrackerFactory )
01969 {
01970         QModelIndex parentIndex = ((! sceneModelView->currentIndex().isValid() ) || (sceneModelView->currentIndex() == sceneModelView->rootIndex())) ?
01971                                                                         m_sceneModel->index (0,0,sceneModelView->rootIndex()):
01972                                                                         sceneModelView->currentIndex();
01973 
01974         TSceneKit* scene = m_document->GetSceneKit();
01975 
01976         /*Las 2 lineas siguientes son para obtener el valor del nodo padre*/
01977         InstanceNode* parentInstance = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( parentIndex );
01978         SoNode* parentNode = parentInstance->GetNode();
01979         /*Si el valor del nodo padre es del tipo TseparatorKit, permitimos la creacion del Traker**/
01980         if(parentNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) ){
01981         
01982                 TSeparatorKit* separatorKit = static_cast< TSeparatorKit* >( parentNode );
01983                 TTracker* trak = static_cast< TTracker* >( separatorKit->getPart( "tracker", false ) );
01984 
01985             if ( trak )
01986             {
01987                 QMessageBox::information( this, "Tonatiuh Action",
01988                                           "This TSeparatorKit already contains a traker node", 1);
01989                     return;
01990             }
01991         TTracker* tracker = pTTrackerFactory->CreateTTracker( );
01992         tracker->SetSceneKit( scene );
01993 
01994         CmdInsertTracker* command = new CmdInsertTracker( tracker, parentIndex, scene, m_sceneModel );
01995         m_commandStack->push( command );
01996 
01997         m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
01998         m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
01999         }
02000         /*En caso de que el valor del nodo padre no sea del tipo TSeparatorKit,
02001          *no realizamos ninguna modicacion en SceneModel*/
02002         else return;
02003         
02004 }
02005 
02006 
02007 //for treeview signals
02008 void MainWindow::mousePressEvent( QMouseEvent * e )
02009 {
02010         QPoint pos = e->pos();
02011         int x = pos.x();
02012         int y = pos.y()-64;
02013 
02014         QSplitter *pSplitter = findChild<QSplitter *>( "graphicHorizontalSplitter" );
02015         QRect mainViewRect = pSplitter->geometry();
02016 
02017         if( mainViewRect.contains( x, y ) )
02018         {
02019                 QSplitter *pvSplitter1 = findChild<QSplitter *>( "graphicVerticalSplitter1" );
02020                 QSplitter *pvSplitter2 = findChild<QSplitter *>( "graphicVerticalSplitter1" );
02021                 QRect vViewRect1 = pvSplitter1->geometry();
02022                 if(vViewRect1.contains(x,y))
02023                 {
02024                         QList<int> size(pvSplitter2->sizes());
02025                         if(x < size[0])
02026                                 m_focusView = 0;
02027                         if(x > size[0])
02028                                 m_focusView = 1;
02029                 }
02030                 else
02031                 {
02032                         QList<int> size(pvSplitter1->sizes());
02033                         if(x < size[0])
02034                                 m_focusView = 2;
02035                         if(x > size[0])
02036                                 m_focusView = 3;
02037                 }
02038         }
02039 }

02041 
02042 void MainWindow::itemDragAndDrop( const QModelIndex& newParent,  const QModelIndex& node)
02043 {
02044         if( node == sceneModelView->rootIndex() ) return;
02045 
02046 
02047         InstanceNode* nodeInstnace = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( node );
02048         if(nodeInstnace->GetParent()&&nodeInstnace->GetParent()->GetNode()->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoBaseKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
02049         {
02050                 SoNode* coinNode = nodeInstnace->GetNode();
02051                 //if( coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TTracker::getClassTypeId() ) ) return;
02052 
02053                 QUndoCommand* dragAndDrop = new QUndoCommand();
02054                 dragAndDrop->setText("Drag and Drop node");
02055                 new CmdCut( node, m_coinNode_Buffer, m_sceneModel, dragAndDrop );
02056 
02057                 new CmdPaste( tgc::Copied, newParent, coinNode, *m_sceneModel, dragAndDrop );
02058                 m_commandStack->push( dragAndDrop );
02059 
02060                 m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
02061                 m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
02062         }
02063 
02064 }
02065 
02066 void MainWindow::itemDragAndDropCopy(const QModelIndex& newParent, const QModelIndex& node)
02067 {
02068         InstanceNode* nodeInstnace = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( node );
02069         SoNode* coinNode = nodeInstnace->GetNode();
02070         //if( coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TTracker::getClassTypeId() ) ) return;
02071 
02072         QUndoCommand* dragAndDropCopy = new QUndoCommand();
02073         dragAndDropCopy->setText("Drag and Drop Copy");
02074         new CmdCopy( node, m_coinNode_Buffer, m_sceneModel );
02075         new CmdPaste( tgc::Shared, newParent, coinNode, *m_sceneModel, dragAndDropCopy );
02076         m_commandStack->push( dragAndDropCopy );
02077 
02078         m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
02079         m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
02080 }

02094 void MainWindow::ChangeModelScene()
02095 {
02096         TSceneKit* coinScene = m_document->GetSceneKit();
02097 
02098         m_sceneModel->SetCoinScene( *coinScene );
02099     m_graphicsRoot->AddModel( coinScene );
02100 
02101         QModelIndex viewRootNodeIndex = m_sceneModel->IndexFromNodeUrl( QString( "//SunNode" ) );
02102         InstanceNode* viewRootNode = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( viewRootNodeIndex );
02103         sceneModelView->setRootIndex( viewRootNodeIndex );
02104 
02105         InstanceNode* concentratorRoot = viewRootNode->children[ 0 ];
02106 
02107         m_selectionModel->setCurrentIndex( m_sceneModel->IndexFromNodeUrl( concentratorRoot->GetNodeURL() ), QItemSelectionModel::ClearAndSelect );
02108 
02109 }
02110 
02114 SoSeparator* MainWindow::CreateGrid( int xDimension, int zDimension, double xSpacing, double zSpacing )
02115 {
02116 
02117         double xWidth = xDimension * xSpacing;
02118         double zWidth = zDimension * zSpacing;
02119 
02120         int nVertex = xDimension * zDimension + 4;
02121     SbVec3f* vertex = new SbVec3f[nVertex];
02122 
02123     int nLines = xDimension + zDimension + 2;
02124     int* lines = new int[nLines];
02125 
02126 
02127     int vNum = 0;
02128     int lNum = 0;
02129     for( int xIndex = 0; xIndex <= xDimension; ++xIndex )
02130         {
02131                 double xValue = -( xWidth / 2  ) + xIndex * xSpacing;
02132                 vertex[vNum++].setValue( xValue, 0.0, zWidth/ 2 );
02133                 vertex[vNum++].setValue( xValue, 0.0, -zWidth/ 2 );
02134                 lines[lNum++] = 2;
02135         }
02136 
02137         vertex[vNum++].setValue( -xWidth / 2, 0.0, zWidth/ 2 );
02138         vertex[vNum++].setValue( xWidth / 2, 0.0, zWidth/ 2 );
02139     lines[lNum++] = 2;
02140         vertex[vNum++].setValue( -xWidth / 2, 0.0, -zWidth/ 2 );
02141         vertex[vNum++].setValue( xWidth / 2, 0.0, -zWidth/ 2 );
02142     lines[lNum++] = 2;
02143 
02144     for( int zIndex = 1; zIndex < zDimension; ++zIndex )
02145         {
02146                 double zValue = -( zWidth / 2  ) + zIndex * zSpacing;
02147                 vertex[vNum++].setValue( xWidth / 2 , 0.0, zValue );
02148                 vertex[vNum++].setValue( -xWidth / 2 , 0.0, zValue );
02149             lines[lNum++] = 2;
02150         }
02151 
02152 
02153         SoSeparator* grid = new SoSeparator;
02154 
02155         SoMaterial* mat = new SoMaterial;
02156         static float colors[2][3] = { {0.4f, 0.4f, 0.4f}, {0.6f, 0.6f, 0.6f} };
02157         mat->diffuseColor.setValues(0, 2, colors);
02158         grid->addChild(mat);
02159 
02160         SoCoordinate3* line_coords = new SoCoordinate3;
02161         line_coords->point.setValues(0, nVertex, vertex);
02162         grid->addChild(line_coords);
02163 
02164         SoLineSet* lineset=new SoLineSet;
02165         lineset->numVertices.setValues(0,lNum,lines);
02166         grid->addChild(lineset);
02167 
02168 
02169     delete[] vertex;
02170     delete[] lines;
02171         return grid;
02172 
02173 }

02202 
02208 bool MainWindow::Delete( QModelIndex index )
02209 {
02210 
02211         if( !index.isValid()) return false;
02212         if( index == sceneModelView->rootIndex() ) return false;
02213         if( index.parent() == sceneModelView->rootIndex() ) return false;
02214 
02215         InstanceNode* instanceNode = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( index );
02216         SoNode* coinNode = instanceNode->GetNode();
02217 
02218         if( coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TTracker::getClassTypeId() ) )
02219         {
02220                 CmdDeleteTracker* commandDelete = new CmdDeleteTracker( index, m_document->GetSceneKit(), *m_sceneModel );
02221                 m_commandStack->push( commandDelete );
02222         }
02223         else if( coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TLightKit::getClassTypeId() ) ) return false;
02224         else
02225         {
02226                 CmdDelete* commandDelete = new CmdDelete( index, *m_sceneModel );
02227 
02228                 m_commandStack->push( commandDelete );
02229         }
02230 
02231 
02232         m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
02233         m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
02234 
02235         return true;
02236 }
02237 
02241 QSplitter* MainWindow::GetHorizontalSplitterPointer()
02242 {
02243     QSplitter* pSplitter = findChild< QSplitter* >( "horizontalSplitter" );
02244     if( !pSplitter ) tgf::SevereError( "MainWindow::GetSceneModelViewPointer: splitter not found" );
02245     return pSplitter;
02246 }
02247 
02252 bool MainWindow::OkToContinue()
02253 {
02254         if ( m_document->IsModified() )
02255         {
02256                 int answer = QMessageBox::warning( this, tr( "Tonatiuh" ),
02257                                  tr( "The document has been modified.\n"
02258                                      "Do you want to save your changes?"),
02259                                  QMessageBox::Yes | QMessageBox::Default,
02260                                  QMessageBox::No,
02261                                  QMessageBox::Cancel | QMessageBox::Escape );
02262 
02263                 if ( answer == QMessageBox::Yes ) return Save();
02264                 else if ( answer == QMessageBox::Cancel ) return false;
02265         }
02266         return true;
02267 }
02268 
02275 bool MainWindow::Paste( QModelIndex nodeIndex, tgc::PasteType type )
02276 {
02277         if( !nodeIndex.isValid() ) return false;
02278         if( !m_coinNode_Buffer ) return false;
02279 
02280         InstanceNode* ancestor = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( nodeIndex );
02281         SoNode* selectedCoinNode = ancestor->GetNode();
02282 
02283         if ( !selectedCoinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoBaseKit::getClassTypeId() ) ) return false;
02284         if ( ( selectedCoinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TShapeKit::getClassTypeId() ) ) &&
02285         ( m_coinNode_Buffer->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoBaseKit::getClassTypeId() ) ) )       return false;
02286 
02287         if( ancestor->GetNode() == m_coinNode_Buffer)  return false;
02288         while( ancestor->GetParent() )
02289         {
02290                 if(ancestor->GetParent()->GetNode() == m_coinNode_Buffer )      return false;
02291                 ancestor = ancestor->GetParent();
02292         }
02293 
02294         CmdPaste* commandPaste = new CmdPaste( type, m_selectionModel->currentIndex(), m_coinNode_Buffer, *m_sceneModel );
02295         m_commandStack->push( commandPaste );
02296 
02297         m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
02298         m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
02299         return true;
02300 
02301 }
02302 
02306 QDir MainWindow::PluginDirectory()
02307 {
02308         // Returns the path to the top level plug-in directory.
02309         // It is assumed that this is a subdirectory named "plugins" of the directory in
02310         // which the running version of Tonatiuh is located.
02311 
02312     QDir directory( qApp->applicationDirPath() );
02313         directory.cd( "plugins" );
02314         return directory;
02315 }
02316 
02320 void MainWindow::ReadSettings()
02321 {
02322     QSettings settings( "NREL UTB CENER", "Tonatiuh" );
02323     QRect rect = settings.value( "geometry", QRect(200, 200, 400, 400 ) ).toRect();
02324     move( rect.topLeft() );
02325     resize( rect.size() );
02326 
02327     setWindowState( Qt::WindowNoState );
02328     if( settings.value( "windowNoState", false ).toBool() )     setWindowState( windowState() ^ Qt::WindowNoState );
02329     if( settings.value( "windowMinimized", false ).toBool() )   setWindowState( windowState() ^ Qt::WindowMinimized );
02330     if( settings.value( "windowMaximized", true ).toBool() )    setWindowState( windowState() ^ Qt::WindowMaximized );
02331     if( settings.value( "windowFullScreen", false ).toBool() )  setWindowState( windowState() ^ Qt::WindowFullScreen );
02332     if( settings.value( "windowActive", false ).toBool() )      setWindowState( windowState() ^ Qt::WindowActive );
02333     m_recentFiles = settings.value( "recentFiles" ).toStringList();
02334     UpdateRecentFileActions();
02335 
02336 }
02337 
02341 bool MainWindow::ReadyForRaytracing( InstanceNode*& rootSeparatorInstance,
02342                                                                         InstanceNode*& lightInstance,
02343                                                                         SoTransform*& lightTransform,
02344                                                                         TSunShape*& sunShape,
02345                                                                         TLightShape*& raycastingShape,
02346                                                                         TTransmissivity*& transmissivity )
02347 {
02348 
02349         //Check if there is a scene
02350         TSceneKit* coinScene = m_document->GetSceneKit();
02351         if ( !coinScene )  return false;
02352 
02353         //Check if there is a transmissivity defined
02354         if ( !coinScene->getPart( "transmissivity", false ) )   transmissivity = 0;
02355         else
02356                 transmissivity = static_cast< TTransmissivity* > ( coinScene->getPart( "transmissivity", false ) );
02357 
02358         //Check if there is a rootSeparator InstanceNode
02359         rootSeparatorInstance = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( sceneModelView->rootIndex() );
02360         if( !rootSeparatorInstance ) return false;
02361 
02362         InstanceNode* sceneInstance = rootSeparatorInstance->GetParent();
02363         if ( !sceneInstance )  return false;
02364 
02365         //Check if there is a light and is properly configured
02366         if ( !coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", false ) )     return false;
02367         TLightKit* lightKit = static_cast< TLightKit* >( coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", false ) );
02368 
02369         lightInstance = sceneInstance->children[0];
02370         if ( !lightInstance ) return false;
02371 
02372         if( !lightKit->getPart( "tsunshape", false ) ) return false;
02373         sunShape = static_cast< TSunShape * >( lightKit->getPart( "tsunshape", false ) );
02374 
02375         if( !lightKit->getPart( "icon", false ) ) return false;
02376         raycastingShape = static_cast< TLightShape * >( lightKit->getPart( "icon", false ) );
02377 
02378         if( !lightKit->getPart( "transform" ,false ) ) return false;
02379         lightTransform = static_cast< SoTransform * >( lightKit->getPart( "transform" ,false ) );
02380 
02381 
02382         QVector< RandomDeviateFactory* > randomDeviateFactoryList = m_pluginManager->GetRandomDeviateFactories();
02383         QVector< TPhotonMapFactory* > photonmapFactoryList = m_pluginManager->GetPhotonMapFactories();
02384 
02385         //Check if there is a random generator selected;
02386         if( m_selectedRandomDeviate == -1 )
02387         {
02388                 if( randomDeviateFactoryList.size() > 0 ) m_selectedRandomDeviate = 0;
02389                 else    return false;
02390         }
02391 
02392         //Create the random generator
02393         if( !m_rand )   m_rand =  randomDeviateFactoryList[m_selectedRandomDeviate]->CreateRandomDeviate();
02394 
02395         //Check if there is a photon map type selected;
02396         if( m_selectedPhotonMap == -1 )
02397         {
02398                 if( photonmapFactoryList.size() > 0 ) m_selectedPhotonMap = 0;
02399                 else    return false;
02400         }
02401 
02402         //Create the photon map where photons are going to be stored
02403         if( !m_increasePhotonMap )
02404         {
02405                 delete m_photonMap;
02406                 m_photonMap = 0;
02407         }
02408 
02409         if( !m_photonMap )
02410         {
02411                 QVector< TPhotonMapFactory* > photonmapFactoryList = m_pluginManager->GetPhotonMapFactories();
02412 
02413                 m_photonMap = photonmapFactoryList[m_selectedPhotonMap]->CreateTPhotonMap();
02414                 m_tracedRays = 0;
02415         }
02416 
02417 
02418         return true;
02419 }
02420 
02426 bool MainWindow::SaveFile( const QString& fileName )
02427 {
02428         if( !m_document->WriteFile( fileName ) )
02429         {
02430                 statusBar()->showMessage( tr( "Saving canceled" ), 2000 );
02431                 return false;
02432         }
02433 
02434         SetCurrentFile( fileName );
02435         statusBar()->showMessage( tr( "File saved" ), 2000 );
02436         return true;
02437 }
02438 
02442 void MainWindow::SetCurrentFile( const QString& fileName )
02443 {
02444         m_currentFile = fileName;
02445         m_document->SetDocumentModified( false );
02446 
02447         QString shownName = "Untitled";
02448         if ( !m_currentFile.isEmpty() )
02449         {
02450                 shownName = StrippedName( m_currentFile );
02451                 m_recentFiles.removeAll( m_currentFile );
02452                 m_recentFiles.prepend( m_currentFile );
02453                 UpdateRecentFileActions();
02454         }
02455 
02456         setWindowTitle( tr( "%1[*] - %2" ).arg( shownName ).arg( tr( "Tonatiuh" ) ) );
02457 }
02458 
02462 void MainWindow::SetupActions()
02463 {
02464     m_recentFileActions = new QAction*[m_maxRecentFiles];
02465     for ( int i = 0; i < m_maxRecentFiles; ++i )
02466     {
02467         m_recentFileActions[i] = new QAction( this );
02468         m_recentFileActions[i]->setVisible( false );
02469         connect( m_recentFileActions[i], SIGNAL( triggered() ),
02470                                            this, SLOT( OpenRecentFile() ) );
02471     }
02472 }
02473 
02474 void MainWindow::SetupActionsInsertMaterial()
02475 {
02476         QVector< TMaterialFactory* > materialsFactoryList = m_pluginManager->GetMaterialFactories();
02477         if( !( materialsFactoryList.size() > 0 ) )      return;
02478 
02479         QMenu* pMaterialsMenu = menuInsert->findChild< QMenu* >( "menuMaterial" );
02480         if( !pMaterialsMenu ) return;
02481         if( pMaterialsMenu->isEmpty() )
02482         {
02483                 //Enable material menu
02484                 pMaterialsMenu->setEnabled( true );
02485                 m_materialsToolBar = CreateMaterialsTooBar( pMaterialsMenu );
02486         }
02487 
02488         for( int i = 0; i < materialsFactoryList.size(); ++i )
02489         {
02490                 TMaterialFactory* pTMaterialFactory = materialsFactoryList[i];
02491 
02492                 ActionInsertMaterial* actionInsertMaterial = new ActionInsertMaterial( pTMaterialFactory->TMaterialName(), this, pTMaterialFactory );
02493             actionInsertMaterial->setIcon( pTMaterialFactory->TMaterialIcon() );
02494 
02495             pMaterialsMenu->addAction( actionInsertMaterial );
02496                 m_materialsToolBar->addAction( actionInsertMaterial );
02497                 m_materialsToolBar->addSeparator();
02498             connect( actionInsertMaterial, SIGNAL( triggered() ),
02499                          actionInsertMaterial, SLOT( OnActionInsertMaterialTriggered() ) );
02500                 connect( actionInsertMaterial, SIGNAL( CreateMaterial( TMaterialFactory* ) ),
02501                                                  this, SLOT( CreateMaterial( TMaterialFactory* ) ) );
02502 
02503         }
02504 
02505 }
02506 
02510 void MainWindow::SetupActionsInsertShape()
02511 {
02512         QVector< TShapeFactory* > shapeFactoryList = m_pluginManager->GetShapeFactories();
02513         if( !( shapeFactoryList.size() > 0 ) )  return;
02514 
02515     QMenu* menuShape = menuInsert->findChild< QMenu* >( "menuShape" );
02516     if( !menuShape ) return;
02517         if( menuShape->isEmpty() )
02518     {
02519                 //Enable Shape menu
02520                 menuShape->setEnabled( true );
02521 
02522         //Create a new toolbar for trackers
02523         m_shapeToolBar = new QToolBar( menuShape );
02524                 if( m_shapeToolBar )
02525                 {
02526                         m_shapeToolBar->setObjectName( QString::fromUtf8( "shapeToolBar" ) );
02527                         m_shapeToolBar->setOrientation( Qt::Horizontal );
02528                 addToolBar( m_shapeToolBar );
02529                 }
02530                 else tgf::SevereError( "MainWindow::SetupToolBars: NULL m_trackersToolBar" );
02531     }
02532         for( int i = 0; i < shapeFactoryList.size(); ++i )
02533         {
02534                 TShapeFactory* pTShapeFactory = shapeFactoryList[i];
02535                 ActionInsertShape* actionInsertShape = new ActionInsertShape( pTShapeFactory->TShapeName(), this, pTShapeFactory );
02536                 actionInsertShape->setIcon( pTShapeFactory->TShapeIcon() );
02537 
02538                 menuShape->addAction( actionInsertShape );
02539                 m_shapeToolBar->addAction( actionInsertShape );
02540                 m_shapeToolBar->addSeparator();
02541                 connect( actionInsertShape, SIGNAL( triggered() ), actionInsertShape, SLOT( OnActionInsertShapeTriggered() ) );
02542                 connect( actionInsertShape, SIGNAL( CreateShape( TShapeFactory* ) ), this, SLOT( CreateShape(TShapeFactory*) ) );
02543         }
02544 }

02546 void MainWindow::SetupActionsInsertTracker()
02547 {
02548         QVector< TTrackerFactory* > trackerFactoryList = m_pluginManager->GetTrackerFactories();
02549         if( !( trackerFactoryList.size() > 0 ) )        return;
02550 
02551         QMenu* pTrackerMenu = menuInsert->findChild< QMenu* >( "menuTracker" );
02552         if( !pTrackerMenu ) return;
02553         if( pTrackerMenu->isEmpty() )

02556                 pTrackerMenu->setEnabled( true );
02557

02559                 m_trackersToolBar = CreateTrackerTooBar( pTrackerMenu );
02560         }
02561 
02562         for( int i = 0; i < trackerFactoryList.size(); ++i )
02563         {
02564                 TTrackerFactory* pTTrackerFactory = trackerFactoryList[i];
02565                 ActionInsertTracker* actionInsertTracker = new ActionInsertTracker( pTTrackerFactory->TTrackerName(), this, pTTrackerFactory );
02566                 actionInsertTracker->setIcon( pTTrackerFactory->TTrackerIcon() );
02567

02569                 m_trackersToolBar->addAction( actionInsertTracker );
02570                 m_trackersToolBar->addSeparator();
02571                 connect( actionInsertTracker, SIGNAL( triggered() ), actionInsertTracker, SLOT( OnActionInsertTrackerTriggered() ) );
02572                 connect( actionInsertTracker, SIGNAL( CreateTracker( TTrackerFactory* ) ), this, SLOT( CreateTracker(TTrackerFactory*) ) );
02573         }
02574 }

02588 void MainWindow::SetupCommandView()
02589 {
02590     m_commandStack = new QUndoStack(this);
02591         m_commandView = new QUndoView( m_commandStack );
02592         m_commandView->setWindowTitle( tr( "Command List" ) );
02593         m_commandView->setAttribute( Qt::WA_QuitOnClose, false );
02594     connect( m_commandStack, SIGNAL( canRedoChanged( bool ) ),

02690 void MainWindow::SetupGraphicView()
02691 {
02692         //SetupGraphcisRoot();
02693 
02694         QSplitter* pSplitter = findChild<QSplitter *>( "horizontalSplitter" );
02695 
02696         QSplitter* graphicHorizontalSplitter = new QSplitter();
02697         graphicHorizontalSplitter->setObjectName( QString::fromUtf8("graphicHorizontalSplitter") );
02698     graphicHorizontalSplitter->setOrientation( Qt::Vertical );
02699     pSplitter->insertWidget( 0, graphicHorizontalSplitter );
02700 
02701         QList<int> sizes;
02702     sizes<<500<<200;
02703     pSplitter->setSizes ( sizes );
02704 
02705 
02706     QSplitter *graphicVerticalSplitter1 = new QSplitter();
02707     graphicVerticalSplitter1->setObjectName( QString::fromUtf8( "graphicVerticalSplitter1" ) );
02708     graphicVerticalSplitter1->setOrientation( Qt::Horizontal );
02709     graphicHorizontalSplitter->insertWidget( 0, graphicVerticalSplitter1 );
02710 
02711     QSplitter *graphicVerticalSplitter2 = new QSplitter();
02712     graphicVerticalSplitter2->setObjectName(QString::fromUtf8("graphicVerticalSplitter2"));
02713     graphicVerticalSplitter2->setOrientation(Qt::Horizontal);
02714     graphicHorizontalSplitter->insertWidget( 1, graphicVerticalSplitter2 );
02715 
02716     QList<int> height;
02717     height<<200<<200;
02718     graphicHorizontalSplitter->setSizes ( height );
02719 
02720     GraphicView* graphicView1 = new GraphicView(graphicVerticalSplitter1);
02721     graphicView1->setObjectName(QString::fromUtf8("graphicView1"));
02722     m_graphicView.push_back(graphicView1);
02723     GraphicView* graphicView2 = new GraphicView(graphicVerticalSplitter1);
02724     graphicView2->setObjectName(QString::fromUtf8("graphicView2"));
02725         m_graphicView.push_back(graphicView2);
02726     GraphicView* graphicView3 = new GraphicView(graphicVerticalSplitter2);
02727     graphicView3->setObjectName(QString::fromUtf8("graphicView3"));
02728         m_graphicView.push_back(graphicView3);
02729     GraphicView* graphicView4 = new GraphicView(graphicVerticalSplitter2);
02730     graphicView4->setObjectName(QString::fromUtf8("graphicView4"));
02731         m_graphicView.push_back(graphicView4);
02732 
02733     graphicVerticalSplitter1->addWidget(m_graphicView[0]);
02734     graphicVerticalSplitter1->addWidget(m_graphicView[1]);
02735     graphicVerticalSplitter2->addWidget(m_graphicView[2]);
02736     graphicVerticalSplitter2->addWidget(m_graphicView[3]);
02737 
02738     QList<int> widthSizes;
02739     widthSizes<<100<<100;
02740     graphicVerticalSplitter1->setSizes ( widthSizes );
02741     graphicVerticalSplitter2->setSizes ( widthSizes );
02742 
02743     if( graphicVerticalSplitter1 && graphicVerticalSplitter2 )
02744         {
02745                 m_graphicView[0] = graphicVerticalSplitter1->findChild< GraphicView* >( "graphicView1" );
02746         if ( m_graphicView[0] != NULL )
02747         {
02748             m_graphicView[0]->resize( 600, 400 );
02749             m_graphicView[0]->SetSceneGraph( m_graphicsRoot );
02750             m_graphicView[0]->setModel( m_sceneModel );
02751             m_graphicView[0]->setSelectionModel( m_selectionModel );
02752         }
02753                 else tgf::SevereError( "MainWindow::InitializeGraphicView: graphicView[0] not found" );
02754 
02755                 if ( m_graphicView[1] != NULL )
02756         {
02757             m_graphicView[1]->resize( 600, 400 );
02758             m_graphicView[1]->SetSceneGraph( m_graphicsRoot );
02759             m_graphicView[1]->setModel( m_sceneModel );
02760             m_graphicView[1]->setSelectionModel( m_selectionModel );
02761             m_focusView=1;
02762             on_action_X_Y_Plane_triggered();
02763         }
02764         else tgf::SevereError( "MainWindow::InitializeGraphicView: graphicView[1] not found" );
02765 
02766                 m_graphicView[2] = graphicVerticalSplitter2->findChild< GraphicView* >( "graphicView3" );
02767         if ( m_graphicView[2] != NULL )
02768         {
02769             m_graphicView[2]->resize( 600, 400 );
02770             m_graphicView[2]->SetSceneGraph( m_graphicsRoot );
02771             m_graphicView[2]->setModel( m_sceneModel );
02772             m_graphicView[2]->setSelectionModel( m_selectionModel );
02773             m_focusView=2;
02774             on_action_Y_Z_Plane_triggered();
02775         }
02776         else tgf::SevereError( "MainWindow::InitializeGraphicView: graphicView[2] not found" );
02777 
02778         m_graphicView[3] = graphicVerticalSplitter2->findChild< GraphicView* >( "graphicView4" );
02779         if ( m_graphicView[3] !=  NULL )
02780         {
02781             m_graphicView[3]->resize( 600, 400 );
02782             m_graphicView[3]->SetSceneGraph( m_graphicsRoot );
02783             m_graphicView[3]->setModel( m_sceneModel );
02784             m_graphicView[3]->setSelectionModel( m_selectionModel );
02785             m_focusView=3;
02786             on_action_X_Z_Plane_triggered();
02787         }
02788             else tgf::SevereError( "MainWindow::InitializeGraphicView: graphicView[3] not found" );
02789     }
02790         else tgf::SevereError( "MainWindow::InitializeGraphicView: verticalSplitter not found" );
02791 
02792         m_graphicView[1]->hide();
02793         m_graphicView[2]->hide();
02794         m_graphicView[3]->hide();
02795         m_focusView = 0;
02796 }
