02941 void MainWindow::ShowRaysIn3DView()
02942 {
02943         actionDisplayRays->setEnabled( false );
02944         actionDisplayRays->setChecked( false );
02945 
02946 
02947         if( m_tracedRays > 0.0 && ( m_fraction > 0.0 || m_drawPhotons ) )
02948         {
02949                 SoSeparator* rays = new SoSeparator;
02950                 rays->ref();
02951                 rays->setName( "Rays" );
02952 
02953                 if( m_drawPhotons )
02954                 {
02955                         SoSeparator* points = trf::DrawPhotonMapPoints(*m_photonMap);
02956                         rays->addChild(points);
02957                 }
02958                 if( m_fraction > 0.0 )
02959                 {
02960                         SoSeparator* currentRays = trf::DrawPhotonMapRays(*m_photonMap, m_tracedRays, m_fraction );
02961                         if( currentRays )       rays->addChild(currentRays);
02962 
02963                 }
02964                 m_graphicsRoot->AddRays( rays );
02965 
02966                 actionDisplayRays->setEnabled( true );
02967                 actionDisplayRays->setChecked( true );
02968         }
02969 }

02975 bool MainWindow::StartOver( const QString& fileName )
02976 {
02977         InstanceNode* sceneInstance = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( sceneModelView->rootIndex() );
02978         InstanceNode* concentratorRoot = sceneInstance->children[ sceneInstance->children.size() -1 ];
02979         m_selectionModel->setCurrentIndex( m_sceneModel->IndexFromNodeUrl( concentratorRoot->GetNodeURL() ), QItemSelectionModel::ClearAndSelect );
02980 
02981         actionDisplayRays->setEnabled( false );
02982         actionDisplayRays->setChecked( false );
02983 
02984         m_graphicsRoot->RemoveRays();
02985         m_graphicsRoot->RemoveModel();
02986 
02987         m_commandStack->clear();
02988         m_sceneModel->Clear();
02989 
02990         SetSunPositionCalculatorEnabled( 0 );
02991 
02992         QStatusBar* statusbar = new QStatusBar;
02993         setStatusBar( statusbar );
02994 
02995         if( !fileName.isEmpty() && m_document->ReadFile( fileName ) )
02996         {
02997                 statusbar->showMessage( tr( "File loaded" ), 2000 );
02998             SetCurrentFile( fileName );
02999         }
03000         else
03001         {
03002                 m_document->New();
03003             statusbar->showMessage( tr( "New file" ), 2000 );
03004 
03005             SetCurrentFile( "" );
03006         }
03007 
03008     ChangeModelScene();
03009 
03010 
03011    /*if( fileName.isEmpty() )
03012     {
03013         m_document->New();
03014         statusbar->showMessage( tr( "New file" ), 2000 );
03015     }
03016     else
03017     {
03018         if( !m_document->ReadFile( fileName ) )
03019                 {
03020                         statusBar()->showMessage( tr( "Loading canceled" ), 2000 );
03021                         return false;
03022                 }
03023        statusbar->showMessage( tr( "File loaded" ), 2000 );
03024     }
03025 
03026     SetCurrentFile( fileName );
03027 
03028     ChangeModelScene();*/
03029 
03030         m_sceneModel->DisplayAnalyzeResults();
03031 
03032     return true;
03033 }

03038 QString MainWindow::StrippedName( const QString& fullFileName )
03039 {
03040         return QFileInfo( fullFileName ).fileName();
03041 }
03042 
03046 void MainWindow::UpdateRecentFileActions()
03047 {
03048         QMutableStringListIterator iterator( m_recentFiles );
03049         while ( iterator.hasNext() )
03050         {
03051                 if ( !QFile::exists( iterator.next() ) ) iterator.remove();
03052         }
03053 
03054         for ( int j = 0; j < m_maxRecentFiles; ++j )
03055         {
03056                 if ( j < m_recentFiles.count() )
03057                 {
03058                         QString text = tr( "&%1 %2" )
03059                                        .arg( j + 1 )
03060                                        .arg( StrippedName( m_recentFiles[j] ) );
03061                         m_recentFileActions[j]->setText( text );
03062                         m_recentFileActions[j]->setData( m_recentFiles[j] );
03063                         m_recentFileActions[j]->setVisible( true );
03064                 }
03065                 else m_recentFileActions[j]->setVisible( false );
03066         }
03067 }
03068 
03072 void MainWindow::WriteSettings()
03073 {
03074         QSettings settings( "NREL UTB CENER", "Tonatiuh" );
03075         settings.setValue( "geometry", geometry() );
03076 
03077         Qt::WindowStates states = windowState();
03078         if( states.testFlag( Qt::WindowNoState ) )      settings.setValue( "windowNoState", true );
03079         else    settings.setValue( "windowNoState", false );
03080         if( states.testFlag( Qt::WindowMinimized ) )    settings.setValue( "windowMinimized", true );
03081         else    settings.setValue( "windowMinimized", false );
03082         if( states.testFlag( Qt::WindowMaximized ) )    settings.setValue( "windowMaximized", true );
03083         else    settings.setValue( "windowMaximized", false );
03084         if( states.testFlag( Qt::WindowFullScreen ) )   settings.setValue( "windowFullScreen", true );
03085         else    settings.setValue( "windowFullScreen", false );
03086         if( states.testFlag( Qt::WindowActive ) )       settings.setValue( "windowActive", true );
03087         else    settings.setValue( "windowActive", false );
03088 
03089     settings.setValue( "recentFiles", m_recentFiles );
03090 }
